lifetime_seconds.description: The lifetime of the token, in seconds.

comment.description: If the lifetime is not specified, this token remains valid indefinitely.

401.description: The request does not have valid authentication credentials for the operation.

post.description: Creates and returns a token for a user. If this call is made through token authentication, it creates a token with the same client ID as the authenticated token. If the user's token quota is exceeded, this call returns an error
